reviewText: Ok, I guess. If you don't want to pick out a decent book from the local book store or library. It is better than nothing at all. At least this author did not tell the readers to come to this website and rate his book 5 stars...lol
Have watched it over and over and think they could of gone deeper with the training tips.  Good tips for a newbie.

This is a good intro for some of the most fundamental moves in the game. I once had a coach tell me you only need 3 moves in your back pocket (that you can perform in your sleep) and you can get by 90% of your opponents. If you are looking for these 3 basic moves, this is likely your video (translation: it's great for a younger or less experienced audience). But if you are looking for fun or relatively advanced trickery, keep looking.
Watched this program one time and literally improved my speed. The sections that cover proper technique for running will make a difference to anyone. Technique is key to speed!
